description: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system. This table is the continuation of the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: FOL_UP_LEVEL_CUR
columns.description: Current follow up level.

columns.name: EMPL_ID_NUM
columns.description: Employee ID number of the guarantor.

columns.name: BILLING_NOTE_EXP_DT
columns.description: Billing note expiration date.

columns.name: ALT_BILL_ADDR_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Alternate Billing Address is used. "Y" indicates that the Alternate Billing Address is used. "N" indicates that the Alternate Billing Address is not used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ALT_BILL_CITY
columns.description: This is the city on the Alternate Billing Address.

columns.name: ALT_BILL_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the state on the Alternate Billing Address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ALT_BILL_ZIP
columns.description: This is the zip code on the Alternate Billing Address.

columns.name: RQG_ACCT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this is a requisition grouper account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: GUAR_SYNC_OWNER_ID
columns.description: When using guarantor account syncing, this item is the record pointer to the owning guarantor account, if one exists.

columns.name: EAR_ISOLATED_YN
columns.description:
This flag is set if the guarantor is considered "isolated" for patient data restrictions.  Isolated guarantors are guarantors created from isolated patients.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes


Needs review

columns.name: CVG_LAST_VERIF_DT
columns.description: Contains the date that the corresponding coverage was last verified.

columns.name: USER_CVG_LST_VER_ID
columns.description: Contains the date that the corresponding coverage was last verified.

columns.name: EMPLOYMENT_DATE
columns.description: The date the guarantor was employed.

columns.name: EMPLOYER_FAX
columns.description: The guarantor's employer's fax number.

columns.name: FAX
columns.description: The fax number associated with this guarantor account.

columns.name: LAST_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: Last statement's billed amount

columns.name: LAST_INS_BAL
columns.description: Last statement's insurance amount

columns.name: LAST_CLAIM_DATE
columns.description: Last date the claim was produced

columns.name: BILL_STATUS_EXP_DT
columns.description: Billing status expiration date

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_FREQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
Payment plan frequency


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Weekly


Semi-Monthly


Monthly

columns.name: ACCT_VIP_STAT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether there is VIP status for this account. Y indicates the account has VIP status. N indicates the account does not have VIP status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: HBMYC_LST_ST_V_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when a Hospital Billing statement was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. This field will be updated when either a guarantor-level or hospital account-level statement is viewed in MyChart for this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: HBMYC_LST_DB_V_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when a Hospital Billing detail bill was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: HBMYC_LST_LT_V_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when a Hospital Billing letter was last viewed in MyChart by this guarantor. This field will be updated when either a guarantor-level or hospital account-level letter is viewed in MyChart for this guarantor.  The date and time for this column is stored in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) and can be converted to local time by using the EFN_UTC_TO_LOCAL Clarity database function.

columns.name: CREDIT_SCORE
columns.description: The guarantor's credit score.

columns.name: PROPENSITY_TO_PAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category describing the likelihood for this guarantor to pay.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: FOL_UP_LAST_LET_DT
columns.description: Date the last follow-up letter was sent.

columns.name: UNDIST_CREDIT_BAL
columns.description: Total account undistributed credit balance

columns.name: UNDIST_INS_CR_BAL
columns.description: Account undistributed credit balance - insurance credits only.

columns.name: UNDIST_SP_CR_BAL
columns.description: Account undistributed credit balance - self-pay credits only.

columns.name: DELIVERY_POINT
columns.description: The billing delivery point is a two digit extension to the nine digit US zip code, with values from 00 to 99.

columns.name: MILITARY_RANK_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the military rank to which the patient's guarantor belongs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: BRANCH_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the military branch of service to which the guarantor belongs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MIL_COMPONENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the guarantor's military component, which is used to distinguish between guarantors who are on regular active duty and those who are members of one of the augmenting support groups.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MIL_PAY_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the military pay grade to which the patient's guarantor belongs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: DIST_LATER_COUNT
columns.description: Number of undistributed credits that are marked as for later distribution in this account.

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value corresponding to the county in which the guarantor's employer is located.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ALT_BILL_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the alternate county of the guarantor's billing address.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GUAR_EMPR_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: ALT_BILL_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the alternate country of the guarantor's billing address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ALT_BILL_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The alternate billing house number for the guarantor.

columns.name: ALT_BILL_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the alternate district of the guarantor's billing address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: STMT_HOLD_DT
columns.description: The most recent date on which the account was held from the Professional Billing (PB) statement processing.

columns.name: STMT_HOLD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why the account was held in Professional Billing statement processing.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Minimum guarantor account balance not met


Credit balance on the guarantor account


Guarantor account already on another run


Guarantor account status not to bill


Minimum days between two statements not met


Guarantor address has no ZIP code


Charge Homing is turned on and guarantor account is not in its home


Skip guarantor account extension


No professional balance and no hospital account to bill


No hospital account to bill


Guarantor account has a hospital account with a self-pay payment/adjustment posted today


Guarantor account has a hospital account on payment plan that did not qualify


Form not found


Cannot demand if form requires importing images


Undistributed non self-pay credits


Undistributed self-pay payment


Zero Charge


Statement already processed this month for payment plan


SmartText and Classic forms cannot be included in the same run


Cannot send tickler to guarantor for paperless bill


Minimum days between guarantor detail bill and statement not met


Payment plan already paid for this month


Guarantor has a balance notification scheduled or recently sent


Guarantor billing status not to bill


Statement intervention


Guarantor does not have new activity


Guarantor does not have transactions to bill


Excluded during printing


Guarantor special billing status set to hold statements


Visit auto pay scheduled


Cannot send another statement before processing auto pay from the last statement


Voided transactions


Payor hold


Transaction skip function


Contested


Debit adjustments


Fully Paid Insurance Activity


Visit is not discharged


Posted Not Billed


Transaction skip extension


Service date range


Small balance write off


Client guarantor


Client next statement date is not before end batch date

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the MyChart account that is linked to this guarantor record. This is used when the guarantor is not a patient in the system but needs to have access to the billing information in MyChart.

columns.name: GUAR_SUBDIV_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Capture the guarantor's country subdivision code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: MOBILE_PHONE
columns.description: Mobile phone for guarantor accounts.

columns.name: FOL_UP_LAST_LEVEL
columns.description: This retains the value of the current follow up level (I EAR 3007) when a letter was last generated.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DLQ_AMT
columns.description: This is the sum of delinquent payment plan payments.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE_AMT
columns.description: This includes both the delinquent amount and the amount due for the current month.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_PAID_AMT
columns.description: This is the total amount of the payment plan payments.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_REMAIN_AMT
columns.description: This is the remaining amount of the payment plan.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_SELF_PAY_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) self-pay balance for the account.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_INS_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) insurance balance for the account.

columns.name: HB_EXT_AR_UNDIST_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the Hospital Billing (HB) external Accounts Receivable (AR) undistributed balance for the account.

columns.name: HB_LAST_AUTOPAY_DATE
columns.description: The most recent Auto Pay date for guarantor set up with a payment plan on Auto Pay.

columns.name: EMAIL_ADDRESS
columns.description: Email address documented on the guarantor.   Any clarity report looking for the guarantor's email address must search in the following sequence, and use the first found one: - The primary email address from the associated patient of the guarantor.  - The email address from the MyChart account associated with the guarantor. - The email address returned by this clarity column.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the linked address change was initiated.

columns.name: ADDR_CHG_SOURCE
columns.description: The source record that initiated the linked address changes.

columns.name: PREFERENCE_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the communication preferences record for the guarantor.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_CURRENT_MISS_CNT
columns.description: This item will store the number of payments that are currently late on the payment plan

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TOTAL_MISS_CNT
columns.description: This item will store the total number of missed payments on the account's payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_AUTOPAY_CARD_ID
columns.description: Credit card associated with the payment plan. This credit card will be charged automatically when an installment is due for the payment plan.  This column will be deprecated in the future release as the payment plan is being transitioned to use the scheduled payment framework.  Once the transition is complete, reference the scheduled payment record for the current credit card.

columns.name: PB_PP_AUTOPAY_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: The scheduled payment record (BSP) associated with the guarantor's payment plan. Scheduled payment record is used to define the auto pay payment plan terms, including the payment method, day to trigger payment, and monthly amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_CURR_AMT
columns.description: If Guarantor is on autopayment plan using Scheduled Payment architecture, this item stores the monthly amount to be used for this payment plan cycle if the value is different than the updated payment plan monthly amount in payment plan amount.

columns.name: KI_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_DATE
columns.description: This item indicates the most recent date the patient verified the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.

columns.name: KI_GUAR_ACCT_VERIF_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates the most recent patient-selected status of whether the self-guarantor billing information is correct in Welcome.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Kiosk - Needs Review


Kiosk - Verified

columns.name: LAST_PB_BAL_NOTIF_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the last balance notification was sent to the guarantor for their Professional Billing (PB) balances.

columns.name: LAST_HB_BAL_NOTIF_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the last balance notification was sent to the guarantor for their Hospital Billing (HB) / Single Billing Office (SBO) balances.

columns.name: PB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: This is updated based on changes to patient balance.

columns.name: HB_SELF_PAY_BAL_UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: This is updated based on changes to Hospital Billing (HB) self-pay balance (I EAR 20003).
